attributes.action: as a matter of urgency, to conduct a full public enquiry into the actual and potential health risks to local residents from the Eastcroft incinerator plant, located within Nottingham city.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Owing to the ongoing breaches of emission limits and the proposed expansion of the site, we the undersigned request that alternative options are sought through relocation of the site and creation of recycling facilities for local residents, in order that local residents can benefit from  both cleaner air and also contribute to a greener environment
